creator: FE Online
title: 18% return in 1 year: Buy India’s largest infrastructure share and gain 18% more in next 1 year
dc:creator: FE Online
content: We take a look at India's largest infrastructure share that has returned about 18% in the last one year. Interestingly, the parent company is the largest infrastructure firm in the country by turnover, market capitalisation, net profit and investment.
